title: Data Presentation
overview: This section focuses on presenting your findings clearly and professionally. Using charts, layout tools, and dashboard techniques, you can turn your analysis into insights that are easy to understand. These skills are essential for communicating effectively in your role and meeting the expectations of Assessment Method 1.

skills: Add titles, headings, and number formatting

skills: Use slicers and filters to make charts interactive
Apply conditional formatting to highlight key figures
Add annotations to highlight key trends
levels.task: Create a pivot chart summarising amounts by region. Add a slicer for region and use conditional formatting to highlight values above £200.

skills: Build a dashboard layout using multiple charts
Use named ranges or dynamic tables
levels.task: Create a dashboard with two charts: one filtered by region and another by amount range. Use dropdown menus and chart titles tailored for a management audience.
